name: Bellevue On The Beach Suites
description:
Indulge in the lap of luxury and create cherished memories at Bellevue On The Beach Suites, a stunning 5-star property in Rhodes town, offering unparalleled serenity and the ultimate seaside haven experience.
As a design hotel, Bellevue On The Beach Suites sets a new standard for elegance and sophistication. Guests can step into a beautifully modern & elegant establishment, where contemporary design meets timeless charm.
Whether you're a solo traveler seeking a peaceful retreat, a couple on a romantic escapade, or a family on a memorable vacation, the 13 exquisite suites are meticulously crafted to provide the utmost comfort and luxury.
Each suite exudes style and sophistication, featuring modern amenities and breathtaking sea views. Guests can relax in the spacious living areas, unwind on their private balcony or terrace, and revel in the soothing ambiance of the rooms. A world of tranquility awaits as guests sink into the king-size bed, ensuring a restful night's sleep.
Bellevue On The Beach Suites embraces the joy of having your beloved pets join you on your adventure. It warmly welcomes small dogs weighing up to 7 kg offering comfortable accommodations and special amenities to ensure a delightful stay for both you and your furry companions.  
The hotel's location is a true highlight, with the beach just a stone's throw away. Separated by a street, guests have easy access to sandy and pebbly shores, and for those looking to relax and soak up the sun, there are sun loungers and parasols available on the beach, provided by a third-party operator, for a fee. 
While Bellevue On The Beach Suites offers a serene retreat, it remains conveniently located in the heart of the city. Situated in a central location, the hotel is just 700 meters away from the city center, making it easy for guests to explore the vibrant local attractions, restaurants, and shopping opportunities.
For those interested in venturing further, the hotel is close to various transport options. A bus stop is a mere 110 meters away, and the journey to tourist attractions takes only 4 minutes on foot. Bellevue On The Beach Suites also offers exquisite guided tours  & Luxury VIP Transfer Service.
Bellevue On The Beach Suites strives to provide exceptional guest services and amenities. The reception is available 24/7, ensuring that guests have a seamless and comfortable stay. The hotel offers free WiFi access throughout the property, allowing guests to stay connected and share their holiday experiences effortlessly.
When it comes to meals, breakfast, lunch, and dinner options are available. The hotel offers its guests a complimentary breakfast included in the overall price of their stay, providing a warm and satisfying start to the day. For the utmost convenience and to cater to individual preferences, Bellevue On The Beach Suites offers a range of delectable meals beyond breakfast, with additional charge. Guests can savor warm and delicious à la carte meals for breakfast and dinner, as well as a variety of cold cuts, fruits, and jams. Prior notification is required for the hotel to cater to various dietary preferences, including gluten-free, vegan, and vegetarian options, ensuring that all guests can enjoy their meals.
Indulge in culinary delights at the renowned Bellevue Restaurant, where the executive chef prepares a delectable array of Greek, Mediterranean and Italian cuisine using only the finest sourced ingredients. 
Unwinding with a refreshing drink at the Lobby Bar is a must, where guests can relax in a stylish and sophisticated atmosphere. Sipping on expertly crafted cocktails, fine wines, or favorite beverages while enjoying the company of friends or loved ones is the perfect way to end the day. For a quick pick-me-up, the Café offers a delightful selection of hot and cold beverages.
The hotel's facilities include a beautiful terrace and an indoor rooftop pool, accessible upon request and reservation, providing guests with breathtaking views of the sea. From November to May, the pool is comfortably heated, providing the perfect setting for a soothing dip. An additional outdoor pool is also available for guests seeking a tranquil swim.
For guests who enjoy staying active during their vacation, Bellevue On The Beach Suites offers various sports and wellness facilities. Guests can indulge in rejuvenating massage treatments or go jogging to explore the stunning surroundings.
At Bellevue On The Beach Suites, guest comfort and satisfaction are the top priorities. Immersing oneself in the opulent surroundings, basking in the warm hospitality of the qualified staff, and creating unforgettable memories in this picturesque Greek paradise is an experience not to be missed. Discover the pinnacle of luxury and style at Bellevue On The Beach Suites in Rhodes, Greece.
